participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, enjoys spending time with family and friends, and has a competitive spirit when it comes to sports.
participant_1.background: i am a male. i own a house in florida. i've a children and a dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and determined, values service and commitment, and has a straightforward approach to life.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.
